ClsC_6dcb0bac.class_description: A specific report detailing fitness-for-service evaluation procedures for pressure vessels, tanks, and piping.

members.entity_description: Fitness-For-Service evaluation procedures for operating pressure vessels, tanks, and piping.
members.resolution_context: MPC Report FS-26 outlines fitness-for-service evaluation procedures for operating pressure vessels, tanks, and piping in refinery and chemical service.

ClsC_fd68d4a5.class_description: The Heat Affected Zone (HAZ) is the area of base metal near a weld that has not melted but has undergone changes in microstructure and mechanical properties due to welding heat.

members.entity_description: The portion of the base metal adjacent to a weld with altered microstructure and properties due to welding heat.
members.resolution_context: The Heat Affected Zone (HAZ) is described as the area of base metal near a weld that has not melted but has undergone changes in microstructure and mechanical properties due to welding heat.
